description: My school project excuse for a little talk still works like a charm. Today it helped me meet a guy from Slovakia. He left his home country because the prospect here looked so much better. Too bad he was only able to get a crappy job at a supermarket. Not exactly a stellar success he would write home about. I definitely wanted to improve his situation. Of course, I had naughty intentions. I'm not gonna help a cute young man for free. The boy was terrible with money, he spent all he earned at work on nice things. It didn't take too much convincing to make him whip out his cock in the middle of a busy street. For a blowjob we had to find a nice discreet place. The boy turned out to be quite good at taking care of my cock. Now I had to return the favor by taking care of his tight asshole.
title: Czech Hunter 452
